availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Burton Thompson Daviess (Mercer County, Kentucky, student.)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, student. Mercer County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Newton Daviess and Maria W. Thompson Daviess. Resident of Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Student in Mercer County in 1860. Graduated from Kentucky University (University of Kentucky) on June 24, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District No. 2, p. 286B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 34.
Catalogue of the Officers and Students of Kentucky University for the Session of 1870-71 (Lexington, KY: John P. Morton and Company, 1871), 28.
"Harrodsburg, July 31," Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), August 2, 1881, p. 6.
"John Burton T. Daviess (1842-1881)," Find A Grave, Memorial #137966687, accessed June 9, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/137966687/john-burton_t-daviess
